items.title: Business of Fashion: How To Write A Fashion Business Plan

visible_instructors.title: Nino Via
visible_instructors.job_title: Fashion Design Instructor - Expert Fashion Consultant/Coach
visible_instructors.name: Nino

items.headline: How to Develop the Business Side of a Fashion Brand: A Business Plan. Distribution. Marketing. E-Commerce. Social media.
objectives_summary: Learn how to develop a Business Plan, Consumer and Product Research, Manufacturing and Production Process, Marketing and E-Commerce, Print-on-Demand, Vision and Purpose for your Company.
Learn how to take your Collection/Line/Brand and turn it into a money making machine.
Learn the business side of the fashion industry

items.title: Jewelry Design Video Course: 23 Step-by-Step Lessons
items.headline: FINALLY get all the answers to your questions about Jewelry Design Process.
objectives_summary: This video course is a blueprint for startup jewelry designers and entrepreneurs offering knowledge of the step by step jewelry making process from IDEA to FINISHED PRODUCT
YOU WILL LEARN: How to design jewelry and sell it, the inside secrets of the jewelry industry, how to avoid unnecessary mistakes and expenses, how to find jewelry suppliers.

items.title: Jewelry Making: How to Create and Make, The Basics In Design
items.headline: Create Incredible Boutique Quality Gemstone Jewellery To Sell, Gift or Wear! Perfect For Business, Friends & Family
objectives_summary: Jewellery Making: For Beginners
Learn to make unique boutique quality gemstone and pearl jewellery to sell, gift or wear.
Make 3 different types of earrings using wire and gemstones ( or your choice of bead) to wear, gift or sell.

items.title: How To Create An Impressive Fashion Design Portfolio
items.headline: A full guide to creating and presenting your fashion portfolio for entry into university, art college or job interviews.
objectives_summary: How to create a fashion design portfolio to enable you to provide visual evidence of your artistic capabilities and distinguished identity
Understand the importance of your portfolio as a communication tool to positively influence universities and employers
Understand what universities and employers want to see in your portfolio in order to help them understand your artistic flare

items.title: Merch by Amazon T-Shirt Design for Non-Designers
items.headline: Step-by-step TShirt Design Tutorials, Best Practices, Design Templates and Which T Shirt Designs Sell on Merch by Amazon
objectives_summary: LEARN the Best Practices when creating a t-shirt design for Merch by Amazon
DISCOVER how to correctly use the Merch by Amazon template
FIND OUT how to make your own Custom Template when designing a t shirt

items.title: Men's Fashion: Tips on How To Dress Well
items.headline: Feel confident with the clothes you wear and experiment with fashion through the principles shared in this course!
objectives_summary: Effectively search for inspiration on high-quality fashion blogs
Recognize different styles of fashion that they appreciate
Apply the 3 principles of “fit, simple, and unique” when making fashion choices

items.title: Screen Printing Made Easy
items.headline: Learn how to screen print from home, on the cheap, without the need for a dark room.
objectives_summary: Create a screen for screen printing without the use of a dark room
Effectively print a custom design onto fabric or t-shirts.
Learn how to care for screens allowing for continued use

Students will learn fitting a sleeve into the armhole correctly.
They will learn how to draft a cuff, sleeve opening, pleats.

items.headline: Build your wardrobe with the help of experienced image consultants. Save time and frustration; feel joy instead.
objectives_summary: You’ll learn clever tricks with minimal different garments and accessories while changing your look.
You’ll learn how you can strengthen or weaken your nonverbal communication by choosing your colors differently.
You’ll learn how you can accentuate or hide certain body features with color

objectives_summary: Draw shoes freehand
Create your designs on the computer using Photoshop and Illustrator
Create a high-quality, realistic computer aided footwear collection so you can show to a factory or shoemaker exactly what you want

items.headline: No Sewing Patterns Needed No Need For Intimidating Sewing Patterns
objectives_summary: beginners become familiar with the basics of machine sewing
sew your own garments for absolute beginners
develop a range of related sewing skills.
